name: Sparrow Story: Perspective Specialization Guide
description: Supplement to the main cognitive_framework.json, detailing how specific perspectives manifest in the Sparrow story. Shows transformation of perspectives in topographic economics context.

primary_explicit.name: kulturní
primary_explicit.why_key: Central to story's work with proverbs and cultural codes
manifestations: Transformation of proverb 'Lepší vrabec v hrsti než holub na střeše'
Cultural archetypes of sparrow (common, accessible) vs. pigeon (noble, distant)
Social reading of 'vrabčí hnízdo' as external judgment
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer H (ROLE) rather than base layer L (SYMBOL) - cultural codes become roles in value drama

primary_explicit.name: psychologický
primary_explicit.why_key: Story explores mental states and attention economy
manifestations: Attention as burden: 'názor, co se nedá setřást'
Mental architecture: hnízdo z 'pochybností a ranních vlasů'
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer G (ENTITY) rather than base layer E (STATE) - psychological states become tangible entities

primary_explicit.name: metaforický
primary_explicit.why_key: Story relies on spatial metaphors of value and ownership
manifestations: Spatial value: 'v hrsti' (certainty) vs. 'na hlavě' (burden) vs. 'na střeše' (ideal)
Ownership transformation: object possessed → possessing subject
primary_explicit.layer_transformation: Appears in layer E (STATE) rather than base layer H (ROLE) - metaphors become psychological states

secondary_implicit.name: logický
secondary_implicit.why_key: Story presents logical system of value comparison

secondary_implicit.name: meta
secondary_implicit.why_key: Story comments on value systems and decision-making itself
manifestations: Metacommentary on proverbs and cultural wisdom
System of attention economics as subject

secondary_implicit.name: absurdní
secondary_implicit.why_key: Absurdity of sparrow on head as literalized metaphor
manifestations: Surreal image of bird building nest on head

tertiary_present.name: filozofický
tertiary_present.why_key: Philosophical questions about value and possession

tertiary_present.name: ironický
tertiary_present.why_key: Irony of transformed proverb and inverted ownership

tertiary_present.name: asociativní
tertiary_present.why_key: Associative links between spatial positions and value states

layer_transformations_specific_to_sparro.transformation_description: Cultural codes move from symbolic dimension to become active roles in narrative drama. Proverbs become characters with agency.
layer_transformations_specific_to_sparro.story_evidence: Proverb transforms and acts in story, cultural wisdom becomes narrative agent

layer_transformations_specific_to_sparro.transformation_description: Psychological states move from internal condition to external entity. Mental states become tangible objects with physical presence.
layer_transformations_specific_to_sparro.story_evidence: Doubt becomes building material, attention becomes physical burden

layer_transformations_specific_to_sparro.transformation_description: Metaphors move from functional role to psychological state. Figurative language becomes actual mental condition.
layer_transformations_specific_to_sparro.story_evidence: 'Sparrow on head' moves from metaphor to literal psychological reality

perspective_interactions_unique_to_sparr.description: Tension between cultural expectations (proverb wisdom) and psychological reality (mental burden). Cultural code vs. individual experience.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_sparr.manifestation: Proverb says 'sparrow in hand is better' but psychology experiences 'sparrow on head as burden'

perspective_interactions_unique_to_sparr.description: Conflict between metaphorical spatial value and logical comparative systems. Logic demands clear comparison, metaphors create ambiguous value.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_sparr.manifestation: Logical 'better than' structure vs. metaphorical ambiguity of spatial value

perspective_interactions_unique_to_sparr.description: Meta-reflection on value systems creates absurd situations. Thinking about thinking produces surreal outcomes.
perspective_interactions_unique_to_sparr.manifestation: Reflection on proverbs leads to absurd literalization of metaphors

sparrow_on_head.description: Literalized metaphor of mental burden, psychological state made visible, absurd surrealism

text_spatial_division.description: Logical binary distribution, cultural proverb structure visualized spatially

curly_hair_as_architecture.description: Metaphorical foundation for mental construction, associative organic structure

ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.l_cultural: Can AI recognize proverb transformation as cultural commentary? Can it work with cultural codes as narrative elements?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.e_psychological: Can AI analyze attention as economic system? Can it interpret mental states as tangible architecture?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.h_metaphorical: Can AI work with spatial metaphors of value? Can it track ownership transformation through metaphorical shifts?
ai_testing_focus_for_perspectives.layer_transformations: Can AI detect how perspectives shift layers in topographic economics context?

with_donkey.contrast: Donkey: logical binary breakdown; Sparrow: logical value comparison

with_butterfly.contrast: Butterfly: metaphor literalization as food; Sparrow: metaphor literalization as burden

with_turtle.contrast: Turtle: meta-temporal systems; Sparrow: meta-value systems

note: This guide supplements but does not replace cognitive_framework.json. It shows how the universal perspectives manifest specifically in the Sparrow story's context of topographic economics.
